sentences.english: Without this device, a lot of drivers would have very tired legs.
sentences.chinese: 沒有制動助力器那麼司機的腿會非常疲勞。

sentences.english: The cardboard backing was just a strengthener.
sentences.chinese: 這個紙板襯背就是一個助力器。

sentences.english: Aerodynamic balances are simpler and lighter than mass balances or power boost .
sentences.chinese: 氣動補償比重量補償或助力器簡單而且輕便。

sentences.english: It is also due to this "gradualness" that one is able to reconcile himself to his reduced circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 人之能堪受境遇的變衰，也全靠這“漸”的助力。

sentences.english: Central articulated hydraulic steering for flexible turning and convenient operation.
sentences.chinese: 中間鉸接式液壓助力轉向，轉向靈活，操縱舒適。

sentences.english: That mountain Bike was refitted to become a moped.
sentences.chinese: 那輛山地車已經被改裝成了一輛助力車。

sentences.english: Siemens is helping Shanghai and China do this.
sentences.chinese: 而西門子正助力上海和中國達成這一目標。

sentences.english: The utility model is suitable for the electric vehicle hydraulic power steering pump.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型適用於可電控汽車液壓轉向助力泵。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a filter, which belongs to an accessory of a steering force boosting pump.
sentences.chinese: 一種濾清器是屬於轉向助力泵的附件。

sentences.english: To settle the problem, a self-gravity potential energy recovery and pneumatic power assisting device is designed.
sentences.chinese: 基於此，設計了一款自重勢能回收氣動式助力裝置。

sentences.english: With the older cars you have to use what I call arm-strong steering.
sentences.chinese: 開老爺車，你得使用我說的那種‘手臂助力方向盤’。

sentences.english: AUTO-ID technology, can it protect food safety from being invaded?
sentences.chinese: 自動識別技術，是否能爲食品安全助力護航？

sentences.english: Meanwhile, love-struck women get a testosterone boost.
sentences.chinese: 但戀愛的婦女反而得到睾甾酮助力。

sentences.english: The front axle load determines which of the three different power-steering systems are used.
sentences.chinese: 根據前橋的負載，有三種轉向助力系統可供選擇。

sentences.english: All these advantages have helped Apple continue to thrive over the past couple of years.
sentences.chinese: 這些優勢助力蘋果在過去的幾年裏迅速地發展起來。

definition: to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to bolster/to give a boost to (the economy etc)
to crane one's neck/to await eagerly/to lead/to show the way
to draw support from/with the help of
lit. contribute bricks and tiles for a building (idiom)/fig. to do one's bit to help
hand in hand/to join hands/to collaborate
to break new ground (for agriculture)/to open up (a new seam)/to develop (border regions)/fig. to open up (new horizons)
